name: Berania: Erstes Buch: Der Kampf
overview: Berania: Erstes Buch: Der Kampf is a fantasy role-playing game that was released for the C64 in late 1994. Due to a divine revelation, a war is raging between the races of Berania (Humans, Orcs, Eemen and Traskans). A human (the player), the Eeme Banshi and the orc Morgul have doubts about the veracity of the revelation and set out to find a way to end the war.
